content: My son just graduated from Parris Island. We want to mount his EGA on a display along with his platoon, company, and battalion numbers but I am not sure which is the correct order. His letters were always platoon first but I assumed that was simply to make the letter sorting easier. Can someone please tell me how it should be done? Thanks
